Summary: I saw two differant event this night. First was what looked like a fighter jet that hovered and then the other were the balls of lights that were flying around
divs: sighting detailsdriving home at about 8pm i saw a light in the sky that stayed in place for maybe 5 min as i drove up to and under it . at which point i started to take a picture but couldnt work my new camera\phone in time and it slowly moved away . it was like a large fighter plane with a large like box on the under side with what looked like luverses .it made no sound and was low maybe 1200 ft or less. i went on home which is less then a mile away and as i was unloading the car i saw these balls od light flying around in the clouds there were not sure maybe five but one was making a large circle . it repeated this circle for over 10 mins . i went in the housr and made my wife come out to see . we watched this happening for over 10 mins
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cordova
This sighting has never been favorited.
